presentationColumns.name: Debit Amount (Accounted)
presentationColumns.description: Shows the subledger debit amount for transactions with subledger details and for other journals it shows the journal debit amount.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL SLA Reconciliation.Debit Amount (Accounted)

presentationColumns.name: Credit Amount (Accounted)
presentationColumns.description: Shows the subledger credit amount for transactions with subledger details and for other journals it shows the journal credit amount.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL SLA Reconciliation.Credit Amount (Accounted)

presentationColumns.name: Net Amount (Accounted)
presentationColumns.description: Shows the activity amount of the specified accounts. Where Activity Amount = Sum of Debit Amount (Accounted) - Sum of Credit Amount (Accounted).
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL SLA Reconciliation.Net Amount (Accounted)
